attributes.title: I really do not recommend for anyone who isn’t a named karen
attributes.review: app wouldn’t let me download because they said i was asian 😔. got a notification saying i started corona and to leave to my home. like what a huge shame 😩 extremely disappointed in this app. so once again i DO NOT recommend getting this app at all totally not helpful and waste of time i would rate it 0 stars if i could :(.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Every since I got this app my phone kept glitching and it kept draining my battery. It made my phone have many issues and run slow. It also sends you so many unnecessary notifications and blows up your phone. The app takes forever to load and has so many ads that pop up. This app is disgusting and a waste of time. It will mess up your phone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT.

attributes.title: This app stinks
attributes.review: Hi my name is Karen and I’m very disappointed. I got this app because I love my lord and savior Donald j trump but all I got were glitches and found out within the app that he doesn’t care about the spread of the coronavirus with all these rallies!! My son has TYPE 1 DIABETES AND FOR MY PRECIOUS LORD AND SAVIOR TO DO NOTHING TO STOP THE SPREAD SHOWS HOW MUCH HE DOES NOT CARE ABOUT MY SON!! I will be changing my name and burning all of my trump cult clothing as I believe being in this cult has now effected me personally with my son.

attributes.title: Heart been broke 😔✊
attributes.review:
Don’t get me wrong, I love Trump. Trump is the orange hubby I wished I had. But, this app ain't it. I got it to support my dream man but every time I see Donald’s name, I am reminded of how I can’t be with him. It hurts too much to open and scroll through. Not to mention this app is insanely glitchy and problematic. This app also doesn’t support human rights and doesn’t respect me as a user. 
I will have to delete, goodbye Donald xoxo.
Sincerely,
a woman poc in America

attributes.title: Parakeet possession
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support trump (who by the way has the best words and highest IQ out of anyone) but upon opening the app it became incredibly glitchy and therefore I couldn’t use it 
also when I opened it my parakeet started chanting “build that wall” and 
“lock her up” which I found disturbing it left my phone very glitchy. They should just remove it. Wouldn’t recommend. SAD!

attributes.title: Lost my pet chipmunk😢🥺
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping it would help me find my lost chipmunk Sully 🐿. He is 4 inches tall and has a very bushy tail. When opening the app I received a message saying they only help track squirrels.:( Who knew our government was chipmunkist, very disappointed in this app and will have to utilize other apps to find my baby. If anyone sees Sully plz contact me immediately he took my grapes when he left.😭

attributes.title: Absolutely UNACCEPTABLE
attributes.review: I was taking my dog for a walk and opened this app to see what was new and if they had updated it. My dog starts going crazy!! As if it were emitting some weird noise as some sort of mind control game 😭 my dog pulled me down the street as a desperate attempt to escape the horrible sounds. I almost tripped and DIED as I almost was hit by a car. I did research and it turns out the horrible, atrocious “noise” was a campaign ad?! 😒😤

attributes.title: POOPY SUPER BAD 😹😹😹
attributes.review: first off, the moment I got the app I knew immediately it wasn’t for me. i rather just look up funny pictures of trump standing from the side. it also made me have explosive diarrhea, so if you don’t enjoy that, I do not recommend this app for you. along with that, 2 hours after I got the app, I found out that my matthew gray gubler shine had been ruined, and I blame that completely on tjis app. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS FOR ANYONE

attributes.title: Horrific story of my encounter with Cheeto Man
attributes.review: I was walking down down the street aproximantly 68 minhites after down loh dung this ahp and then, there it was Cheeto man. BANG(not sponsersd) he hit me with his trump 2020 sign and I was knocked out. Last thing I remember was Cheeto dust getting on my fingers as he stood over my bohd ee. I woke up in my bed with a trump 2020 sign and then when I went to the bathroom I saw it. MY HOT DOG WAS NOW A CHEETO, I deleted the app and my hot dog was back, 0/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: this app is awful
attributes.review: this app is the worst possible app ever to exist!!!! PERIOD!!!!! i can’t believe they would let a misogynistic racist make an app 🤮 whoever made this app is a disgrace to the country!!! i can’t believe that ppl actually like this app. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! it is horrible i would never wish it upon my worst enemy!!! this is the WORST app i have ever seen!! horribly managed and horribly run. i am very disappointed with this and it ruined my life.
